title: Riot Help! LoL not opening properly.
body:
Hi Riot. Recently, after the client update, my league stops responding every time I open it! As ussual, the client said, requires update and said it needed to restart with a countdown. I let it restart, and then when I tried to open it, it would not open properly. When I attempt to open it, windows tells me, there is a separate instance of LoL running and asks me to terminate it. I terminate the program, to prevent any interruptions it might cause. The logo shows and then, windows would tell me that the client had stopped responding and ask if I wanted to end the task or wait. I have tried waiting, but of course, that never works. 

This is unlike any problem I have ever experienced before. When I first downloaded league, league never worked properly because it could not connect to a server. I used the hextech repair tool which fixed my problems. Now, I have tried the tool, but it still does not work  ;-;

Riot, please help!

If anyone else has experienced this problem before and has found a way to solve it, and prevent it from happening in the future, please feel free to share it.

Edit: I have checked the task manager, and there appears to be no separate instance of LoL running even though windows claims there to be.

replies.body: It sounds like your client is crashing, but some of those processes that are still running are getting in the way when you try to launch it again. Let's first make sure that you've got a clean install of the game by grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a reinstall and clean uninstall.
